Title: A Divina Comédia
Writer: Manoel de Oliveira (scenario), Manoel de Oliveira (dialogue), Fyodor Dostoevsky (extracts), José Régio (extracts), Friedrich Nietzsche (extracts)
Actors: Maria de Medeiros, Miguel Guilherme, Luís Miguel Cintra, Mário Viegas
Plot: Patients in a mental institution see themselves as Adam and Eve, Sonia and Raskolnikov, a Philosopher and a Prophet, Alyosha and Ivan Karamazov, Jesus, Lazarus, Martha, Mary and St Teresa of Avila.
